summary.span: 提供預設的控制項配接器，使用 XHTML 標記來呈現行動控制項。

span.span: Provides a default control adapter for rendering mobile controls in XHTML markup.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會提供呈現控制項和其子系的行動裝置的 XHTML 標記中的每個基底行動控制項配接器。This class provides a base mobile control adapter that renders a control and each of its children in XHTML markup for mobile devices. 它也會提供通用屬性和 helper 方法在衍生的 XHTML 行動控制項配接器。It also provides helper methods and common properties for derived XHTML mobile control adapters. 控制項配接器會覆寫特定的元件類別方法和事件，以允許瀏覽器專用或特定標記的處理。Control adapters are components that override certain class methods and events to allow browser-specific or markup-specific handling. 大部分的轉譯行為中的靈活度會封裝在類別。Much of the adaptability in rendering behavior is encapsulated in the class. 如果您考慮是否要建立您自己的控制項配接器，請記住，單一配接器可以用來覆寫一些瀏覽器類別行為。If you are considering whether to build your own control adapter, keep in mind that a single adapter can be used to override a number of browser class behaviors. 或者，透過衍生自類別中包括所需的可調適性類別，您可能不需要使用控制項配接器。Alternatively, by including the desired adaptability in a class derived from the class, you might eliminate the need to use a control adapter. 除非有更具特製化的介面卡，否則所有的控制項繼承自該類別，適用於特定控制項類別的配接器。An adapter for a specific control class applies to all controls that inherit from that class, unless more specialized adapters are present. 比方說，類別用來驗證裝置的要求，或可以顯示 XHTML 標記的所有行動控制項。For example, the class is used to validate all mobile controls for devices that require or can display XHTML markup. 在處理期間，.NET Framework 會攔截專屬於目前的目標控制項的方法呼叫。During processing, the .NET Framework intercepts calls to the methods of a control that are specific to the current target. 如果與控制項關聯的控制項配接器，則.NET Framework 會呼叫相關聯的配接器的方法。If a control adapter is associated with the control, the .NET Framework calls the associated adapter methods. 控制項的某些屬性用來管理跨多個行動裝置的次要頁面顯示的方式。Some properties of a control govern the way it displays across multiple secondary pages for a mobile device. 這些頁面統稱為*第二個 UI*。These page are collectively known as *secondary UI*. 屬性可用來定義將會顯示哪些頁面。The property can be used to define which page will be displayed. 方法可用來移除任何次要的 UI 設定。The method can be used to remove any secondary UI settings.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果目標裝置會需要這類區塊層級項目上的中斷`
`，所指定的文字寫入器`writer`來呈現項目，在啟動時設定暫止中斷，並自動轉譯中斷 (`
`) 結尾的項目。If the target device requires breaks on block-level elements such as `
`, the text writer specified by `writer` sets a pending break when starting to render the element, and automatically renders a break (`
`) at the end of the element. 如果項目的內容超出裝置上的一個邏輯頁面時，配接器就會清除頁面結尾的暫止中斷。If the content of the element extends beyond one logical page on the device, the adapter clears the pending break at the end of the page. 這個方法主要是在內部使用.NET framework。This method is primarily used by the .NET Framework internally.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有暫止中斷，才能開啟呈現中斷連結標記。If there is a pending break, the break is rendered before the opening link tag. 如果屬性表示實體的檔案和目標裝置不需要的階層式樣式表樣式的隱藏項目，目前的類別名稱會包含在轉譯。If the property represents a physical file and the target device does not require suppression of cascading style sheet styles, the current class name is included in the rendering. 如果樣式表的屬性不代表實體的檔案，從控制項的樣式設定會適用於`tagName`將套用的開頭標記中。If the property of the style sheet does not represent a physical file, style settings from the control that are appropriate for the `tagName` will be applied in the opening tag. 這個方法主要是在內部使用.NET framework。This method is primarily used by the .NET Framework internally.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要是由自訂配置器的開發人員所使用。This method is primarily used by developers of custom adapters.

para.span: 基底實作儲存目前第二個 UI 模式檢視狀態中。

span.span: The base implementation of saves the current secondary UI mode in view state.

para.span: 您可以覆寫，以儲存其他特定的資料，從檢視狀態，但一定要來自基底類別，取得目前的狀態，然後再將它與您的特定控制項的狀態，結合為了跨要求保留第二個 UI 模式。

span.span: You can override it to save other specific data from view state, but be sure to obtain the current state from the base class, and then combine it with your control-specific state in order to preserve the secondary UI mode across requests.

para.span: 如需有關如何管理檢視狀態的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information on managing view state, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

value.span: 表示目前第二個 UI 模式的數字，是由包含該 UI 的表單所決定。

span.span: A number indicating the current secondary UI mode, as determined by the form in which it is contained.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 第二個 UI 會顯示更多畫面的使用者介面的控制項使用。Secondary UI is used by controls that show additional screens of a user interface. 若要使用第二個 UI，控制項配接器會執行下列步驟：To use secondary UI, a control adapter performs the following steps: 1. 控制項配接器設定在回傳事件期間屬性中的基底類別。During a postback event, the control adapter sets the property in the base class. 2. 呈現過程中，檢查第二個 UI 模式中，此控制項，並呈現適當的第二個 UI。In rendering, the control checks the secondary UI mode, and renders the appropriate secondary UI. 3. 為了回應使用者與第二個 UI 互動，控制配接器可能會將第二個 UI 模式變更為另一個值，或藉由呼叫結束第二個 UI 模式方法。In response to user interaction with the secondary UI, the control adapter might change the secondary UI mode to another value, or exit secondary UI mode by calling the method. 這個屬性主要供開發人員的自訂配接器。This property is primarily used by developers of custom adapters.
